data.name: Aggressive
data.description: As a bonus action, the NPC can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

data.name: Ambusher
data.description: The NPC has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

data.name: Avoidance
data.description: If the NPC subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

data.name: Blood Frenzy
data.description: The NPC has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

data.name: Brute
data.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the NPC hits with it.

data.name: Cloaking Device
data.description: The NPC has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

data.name: Self-Destruct
data.description: When the NPC dies, it explodes. Each creature within 4m of it must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking {dmg} thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.name: Grappler
data.description: The NPC has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

data.name: Mind Meld
data.description: The asari targets one humanoid it can see within 10m of it. If the target can see the asari, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this mind meld or be {charmed} by the asari. The charmed target regards the asari as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the asari's control, it takes the asari's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the asari's attacks (disadvantage on saving throws & the asari has advantage on attack made against the target). Each time the asari or the asari's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the asari is killed.

data.name: Leadership
data.description: For 1 minute, the NPC can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 10m of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the NPC. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the NPC is incapacitated.

data.name: Martial Advantage
data.description: Once per turn, the NPC can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 2m of an ally of the NPC that isn't incapacitated.

data.name: Pack Tactics
data.description: The NPC has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the NPC's allies is within 2m of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

data.name: Parry
data.description: The NPC adds 3 to its AC against one melee weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, the NPC must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

data.name: Amphibious
data.description: Can breathe both air and water.

data.name: Bloodlust
data.description: After reducing an enemy to 0 hit points with a melee weapon, the NPC may take another Action this turn.

data.name: Halucinogen
data.description: The drell's skin is infused with a mild venom. When ingested or injected it can cause mild hallucinations.

data.name: Fury of the small
data.description: For 1 minute, the Volus deals 1d4 damage to successful spell and weapon attacks against creatures of Medium-size or larger.

data.name: Hermetic Suit
data.description: When the quarian takes an unshielded, critical hit that deals puncture damage, it's suit becomes breached. On the quarian's turn, it can take no other action except expending a charge of specialized sealant to close the puncture (1 charge). If it has no remaining charges, it becomes {poisoned}.

data.name: Hunter Mode
data.description: For 1 minute the geth can activate its hunter mode, gaining the following: increase speed by 6m, +2 on ranged & melee attack roll and damage rolls, add 1d4 to any tech power damage rolls.

data.name: Rage
data.description: If the krogan begins its turn with less that 1/2 of its hit points, it enters into a rage. The krogan's melee weapon attacks deal one extra die of its damage when the krogan hits with it. This effect lasts 1 minute.

data.name: Relentless
data.description: If damage reduces the NPC to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is from a critical hit. On a success, the NPC drops to 1 hit point instead.

data.name: Repair Matrix
data.description: If the construct begins its turn with less that 1/2 of its hit points, it activates it's repair matrix, regaining 1d6 hit points at the start of its turn. This effect last one minute or until the construct becomes incapacitated.

data.name: Shadow Cloak
data.description: While in dim light or darkness, the NPC can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

data.name: Surprise Attack
data.description: If the NPC surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra {dmg} damage from the attack.
